about.title: Hello, I'm Alex.
about.first: I was born in Germany and spent my early childhood there, but when I was young, my family moved to Spain, where I grew up and completed my degree in Web Development at IES Manacor. Being trilingual in German, Spanish and Catalan has been a valuable asset in my career, as it allowed me to work in the hotel business and tourism industry for eight years. During that time, I honed my language skills and gained valuable experience in customer service and management.
about.second: Despite my success in the hospitality industry, I always felt a strong pull toward the world of technology and web development. I decided to pursue my passion for programming and enrolled in a Web Development degree program at IES Manacor. Over the course of my studies, I gained expertise in a wide range of programming languages, frameworks, and tools, including Spring Boot, NuxtJS, Laravel, etc.
about.third:
Throughout my career, I have worked on a diverse range of projects, from e-commerce
                    websites to custom web applications. I am experienced in both front-end and back-end development using a mix of the earlier mentioned technologies.
                    In addition to my technical skills, I am also committed to delivering outstanding customer service. I pride myself on my ability to communicate
                    effectively with clients, understand their needs, and deliver solutions that exceed their expectations.
about.fourth:
When I'm not coding, you can usually find me exploring new technologies or contributing
                    to open-source projects. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to expand my skills.
about.fifth:
If you're looking for a dedicated web developer to help bring your ideas to
                    life, please don't hesitate to get in touch. I'd love to hear from you!

cispa.title: CISPA - Helmholtz Center for Information Security
cispa.description:
As an intern web developer at CISPA - Helmholtz Center for Cybersecurity, I was responsible for developing and maintaining web applications that facilitated the transfer of scientific knowledge to the industry. My role involved collaborating with a team of experienced developers to develop user-friendly web applications, designing intuitive user interfaces, and ensuring smooth integration with existing systems.

In this role, I gained extensive experience in using various programming languages and web development tools, including NuxtJS, Django and Docker. I also worked closely with the project management team to ensure that all projects were delivered on time and to the highest possible quality.

Overall, my experience as an intern web developer at CISPA provided me with invaluable skills and experience that have helped me to grow and develop my career in the tech industry. I look forward to continuing to build on this experience and to using my skills to make a positive impact on future projects.

playa.title: Playa Esperanza SL
playa.description:
As a Front Office / Booking Agent at Playa Esperanza, I was responsible for ensuring that our guests had a seamless and enjoyable experience from the moment they booked their stay with us. This involved handling guest reservations, check-ins, and check-outs, as well as providing recommendations for local attractions, restaurants, and activities.

In addition to handling guest needs, I also managed the hotel's front office, ensuring that all daily operations were running smoothly. This included managing a team of front desk associates, coordinating with housekeeping and maintenance staff, and handling any guest complaints or issues that arose.

My role as a Front Office / Booking Agent at Playa Esperanza required excellent communication skills, attention to detail, and the ability to multitask in a fast-paced environment.

garden.title: Garden Hotels SL
garden.description:
As a front office staff member at Garden Hotels, my primary responsibility was to provide exceptional customer service to guests from the moment they walked in the door. I was responsible for checking guests in and out of their rooms, answering their questions about hotel amenities and local attractions, and making reservations for them as needed.

In addition to providing basic information and assistance, I was also responsible for handling more complex situations, such as resolving guest complaints and helping guests in emergency situations. I worked closely with other staff members, including housekeeping and maintenance, to ensure that guests had a comfortable and enjoyable stay.

As a front office staff member, I also had to be highly organized and detail-oriented. I was responsible for maintaining accurate records of guest information, as well as managing the hotel's room inventory and ensuring that reservations were properly scheduled and managed.

Overall, my role at Garden Hotels required strong communication skills, a positive and friendly attitude, and the ability to multitask and manage multiple priorities at once.

projects.title: Projects
projects.project1Description: ISP Hero is a comprehensive domain hosting service that offers a variety of services, including domain registration, hosting, and mail services. As a key member of the development team, I was responsible for implementing critical features such as user registration, OAuth, email handling, Live Chat and the purchase process. I utilized Java Spring Boot and Thymeleaf to create a dynamic and responsive user interface, and implemented a robust backend with a SQL database to ensure optimal performance and data security. There is also an admin panel available for general user & data management as well as for automatic translations of the website.
